shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the SDK requests the maximum size of the Metadata.

section.p: After successfully calling and completing registration, the SDK will trigger this callback; you need to specify the maximum data size in the return value of this method.

section.title: Returns
section.p: @return The maximum size of the buffer of the metadata that you want to use. The highest value is 1024 bytes. Ensure that you set the return value.
